US state department spokesman Simon Cowell Crowley, speaking to reporters in Washington yesterday, too indicated that Cameron Munter had called on Asif Ali Zardari to release the arrested official. We continue to make clear to the government of Pakistan that our diplomat has diplomatic immunity; in our view,( he) was acting in self-defence and should be released... Ambassador Cameron Munter met... with President Asif Ali Zardari to continue to make that point, he said. Reports also suggested that this fresh irritant in bilateral relations could affect Asif Ali Zardari 's upcoming visit to Washington. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. A healthy Carmelo Anthony scored 25 points, Allen Iverson had 24 points and 13 assists, and the Denver Nuggets beat the Charlotte Bobcats 117-101 on Saturday night. It didn't hurt at all, said Carmelo Anthony , who missed five games after landing on the foot of Kobe Bryant on Jan. 21. "It felt good to be back."
